    if len(guess)!= len(game):
        raise ValueError('The length of both arrays must be equal.')

    if np.any(game < 0) or np.any(game > 5):
        raise ValueError('Each number in the array of scores should be between 0 and 5.')

    guess = np.array(guess)
    game = np.array(game)

    return np.abs(guess-game)
